smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class FBCalendar is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class CalendarSyncAdapter is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

The function onCreate appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'FBCalendar' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'PreferenceAccessor' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'Preferences' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Preferences' with '56' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'CalendarSyncAdapter' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function createAccount is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onPerformSync is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function updateToVersion2 is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function syncEventsViaGraph is nested too deeply.
Function updateSync is nested too deeply.
Function parsePlace is nested too deeply.
Function parse is nested too deeply.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: EqualsWithHashCodeExist
smells.description: Always override hashCode when you override equals. All hash-based collections depend on objects meeting the equals-contract. Two equal objects must produce the same hashcode. When inheriting equals or hashcode, override the inherited and call the super method for clarification.

instances.message: A class should always override hashCode when overriding equals and the other way around.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (cursor.getInt(column) == 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: cursor.getInt(column) == 1
Parentheses in (mAccounts.count() - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mAccounts.count() - 1
Parentheses in (daysBefore * 24 * 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: daysBefore * 24 * 60
Parentheses in (hours * 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: hours * 60
Parentheses in (daysBefore * (24 * 60)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: daysBefore * (24 * 60)
Parentheses in (daysBefore * (24 * 60)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: daysBefore * (24 * 60)

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.widget.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: PROFILE_PICTURE can be a `const val`.
TAG can be a `const val`.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.
